domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump Meeting with a group of 80 & 90 year olds, not wearing a mask, knowing he may have been exposed to the covid19 virus.  

What a disgusting lack of respect and consideration for the health & well being for these American heros---all for a photo op!
